name: Krishna Harsha Puppala
title: Senior Quality Assurance Analyst
summary: Seasoned Quality Assurance Professional with proven expertise from high-velocity software automation to regulated Medical Device Validation, working across enterprise, healthcare, and cloud-based applications. Hands-on expertise in developing automation frameworks using Java, Python, Selenium, Playwright, Appium, TestNG, and Cucumber (BDD). Skilled in designing and executing functional, regression, integration, API, smoke, and performance tests across web, mobile, on-prem, and cloud platforms (Azure). Recognized for improving defect detection rates, reducing release cycle defects, investigating root cause analysis and optimizing automation coverage to accelerate delivery. Strong collaborator who partners seamlessly with development, product, design, DevOps, and business stakeholders to ensure high-quality, on-time releases. Demonstrates strong analytical, documentation, and problem-solving skills with a continuous-improvement mindset and exceptional attention to detail. Proficient in building risk-based test strategies, authoring detailed test plans, and implementing traceability matrices to ensure full end-to-end coverage for complex features and multi-system integrations. Adept at API validation and automation (Postman), performance testing (JMeter), and CI/CD integration using Jenkins, Git, and Maven. Leverages a strong foundation in regulated medical device verification and validation (V&V), including risk management, requirement traceability, and compliance-focused testing to drive software quality excellence.

responsibilities: Led end-to-end QA testing for enterprise insurance platforms, ensuring quality releases for policy workflows in various legacy web applications

Designed and executed automated regression suites with over 1,000+ automated test cases across critical insurance modules, improving defect detection rate in pre-production by approximately 30% using Selenium and Cucumber, and reducing regression cycle time by approximately 50%

Led the full testing efforts as sole QA in an Agile team on Tomcat-based web service front-end (E2E, regression, smoke), based on monthly release cadence, while uncovering critical defects that saved the business operations millions annually in underwriters' time and resources, and delivered the project on schedule and within budget

Led initial test planning for enterprise legacy application server migrations from Windows Server 2016 to 2022, while actively participating in validation efforts of all pre-production databases inside SQL Server (Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio) migrations

Enhanced and maintained automated regression and smoke test suites using Selenium WebDriver with Cucumber BDD (Gherkin) in a Maven-based Java TestNG automation framework to validate a Springboot and Java PrimeFaces-based UI

Performed REST API validation using Postman, including scenario-based verification, payload validation, and response time analysis to ensure data integrity across modern policy rating engines and legacy AS400 systems
Collaborated in Agile teams to define acceptance criteria, triage defects, and support UAT sign-offs
Maintained and monitored Jenkins continuous integration (CI) pipelines by integrating automated test suites with build pipelines and providing quality gates before deployment

Performed functional, integration, and regression testing for cross-platform mobile applications, achieving 80% defect detection rate while collaborating with developers across build release cycles at Suncor Energy engagement
Led UAT cycles, documented defects in ServiceNow, and provided QA release sign-offs for multiple client projects
Evaluated and communicated the impact of scope changes from a timeline and QA risk perspective to leadership and stakeholders
Introduced simulators for mobile app testing on the Android platform for multiple OS versions, improving testing efficiency
Executed comprehensive test plans for mobile app platforms (iOS and Android) ensuring cross-platform compatibility
Worked closely with internal delivery teams, PMO, and business stakeholders to ensure successful delivery of projects by identifying and mitigating testing risks
Collaborated with QA SMEs, developers, and system architects to develop automation strategies and frameworks aligned with project requirements
Conducted backend database testing using MySQL, including validation of stored data, procedures, triggers, and jobs for internal corporate projects

Conducted regression testing on a mortgage broker application featuring an AI-enabled chatbox built on Microsoft Azure Portal Services, creating end-to-end test suites including UI, API, and data validation
Created and updated automation scripts to execute tests for mobile applications using Testim.io and BrowserStack cloud technologies
Updated and executed load and performance test plans and scripts using LoadRunner and JMeter to ensure application scalability
Piloted UAT activities for several application version releases and provided QA sign-off for business stakeholders

Conducted verification and validation of medical device systems focusing on reliability, risk assessment, and failure analysis for clients including Baxter Healthcare, Roche Diagnostics, and Mentor Worldwide
Designed test protocols and executed validation cycles ensuring compliance with FDA design control requirements and medical device regulations
Performed defect tracking, test traceability matrix creation, and supported CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) investigation documentation
Collaborated with cross-functional software, hardware, and QA teams to evaluate test results and drive continuous improvements in product quality
Ensured all testing activities aligned with regulatory standards and quality system requirements for medical device manufacturing
Performed design verification testing for electromechanical medical devices following structured V&V lifecycle for Zimmer Biomet client projects
Executed test cases, documented defects, and ensured alignment with regulatory and quality system requirements throughout the product development lifecycle
Assisted in test report documentation and traceability linking requirements to validation outcomes to ensure comprehensive coverage
Supported quality assurance activities in a regulated medical device manufacturing environment, ensuring compliance with FDA and ISO standards

projects.name: Selenium Cucumber Framework
projects.description: Developed a Java + Selenium + Cucumber BDD test-automation framework to validate web applications end-to-end
projects.technologies: Java, Selenium WebDriver, Cucumber BDD, TestNG, Maven

projects.name: Playwright Python MCP
projects.description: Built a Python + Playwright test automation suite integrating UI and API testing with CI/CD workflows

projects.name: Docker QA Demo
projects.description: Authored a Docker-based QA demo project for containerized test environments, improving reproducibility of test runs

Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering
